DOC.HEADLINE: MOVIES TO TAPE
DOC.TEXT: El Mariachi ( Cinemax Thursday at 4:40 a.m. ) is Robert Rodriguez ' s sly and hilarious 1992 comedy starring Carloes Gallardo in the title_role . He is an itinerant musician who happens into a Mexican border town only to be mistaken for a hit_man . Cabeza de Vaca ( KCET Saturday at 9 p.m. ) is Nicolas Echeverria ' s stunning anti-imperialist telling of an ill-fated 16th-Century Spanish voyage of exploration to Mexico and part of the United States . Juan Diego stars in this 1990 Mexican film . The Exterminating Angel ( El Angel Exterminador ) ( KCET Saturday at 11 p.m. ) is one of Luis Bunuel ' s most inspired attacks on bourgeois morality ; the guests at a swanky dinner_party find themselves unable to leave -- ever . Silvia Pinal stars . Made in Mexico in 1962 .
